course_description: An advanced writing-intensive course in the construction and formatting of screenplays for upper-level undergraduates, which also broaches various aspects of pre-production planning.
prerequisites: FILM 378R or ENGCW 378R or FILM 378RW or ENGCW 378RW or FILM_OX 378RW or ENG_OX 378RW or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
